body.name: Roxy Women's Oceanside Beach Short
features: ROXY OCEANSIDE SHORT: Have some fun in the sun with the Roxy Oceanside short featuring an easy fit; Lightweight, linen blend fabric and elastic waistband with drawcord provide maximum comfort

LIGHTWEIGHT: The Roxy Oceanside Short is made in a linen and viscose blend that allows for lightweight comfort and breathability; Wear the Oceanside short as a coverup to the beach or for other daily activities or occasions
COMFORT: The Oceanside's easy fit, lightweight fabric, and elastic waistband with drawstring provide maximum comfort
ROXY: Shop our collection of boardshorts, bikinis, shorts, sandals, shoes, tees, graphics, hoodies, flannels, dresses, kids wear, jeans, pants, jackets, sun protection hats, beanies, and backpacks
Roxy creates products that strike the balance between style, performance and femininity; Roxy is a call to action to all women and dreamers to feel beautiful and strong in their own skin.
body.description: Woven pull on beach short, smocked waistband, and rope draw cord.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #69,318 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #178 in Women's Casual Shorts

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oceanside Beach Short Oceanside Elasticized Shorts Crafted from a flax linen-blend fabric for a soft and lightweight feel, the ROXY Oceanside shorts feature a comfy smocked waistband, a drawcord to secure the fit, and handy side pockets. Heart embroidery on the backside pocket adds a little something extra. Comfortable fit with a smocked waistband Fabric: Flax linen viscose blend fabric [200 g/m2]Fit: Beachy fitOutseam: 27.4 cm/10.8" outseam, short lengthInseam: 6.3 cm/2.5" inseamFly/Waist: Smocked waistPockets: Side pocketsBranding: Heart embroidery on backside right pocket Classic beachy style Multiple colors to choose from and also shop for the Oceanside Beach Pant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, flattering and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Great pair of shorts! I'm 5 ft 6" and weigh 140 lbs. I would normally wear a medium, but chose large in all 4 pairs purchased. They are not too tight, too loose or too short. Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute, but SIZE UP
reviews.reviewText: I got these shorts for a trip to Jamaica that I'm taking in the end of May. I'm usually a medium or a large if the sizing runs small, so I ordered a large, and let me tell you... I'm glad I did. Honestly I could have probably gone with an extra large if I wanted the shorts to be a bit looser. The large is pretty form fitting on me, and there is no extra space in the legs, but the shorts are still super comfortable. The length is nice, as they aren't incredibly short. For reference, I'm 5'4, about 165 lbs, and I've got a booty and moderately thick thighs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Idk WHY I take a SM in These shorts & XS in the pants version, BUT…
reviews.reviewText: I love both of my new pairs of shorts 👍! I got the navy blue & army green ones. Sooo cute & even better? Most are on a great sale right now! That’s when I swoop up the deals 😜!!Also, I’d think it would possibly be the opposite, but it’s not, the pants version of these shorts fit me in size XS. I have several. The shorts? I had to return XS & I went with S & it fits like the pants do but a size higher 🤷‍♀️. Pretty funny lol. Just making note of that one.I love them. Super cute & Y2K low rise ✌️. I’ll take back my perfect Y2K belly back now 😂.5++ stars! The quality for the price paid was exceptional! Perfect for sand, surf & everything in between!A true summer wardrobe staple 👍💕!!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️** I hope my review was helpful 😊! **

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Comfy Shorts - FYI Elastic Waistband is Minimal
reviews.reviewText: These are cute, casual, flattering shorts. FYI the elastic waistband mentioned in the product title is minimally "elastic" - I've found it mostly relies on the string closure to keep them up - so tie it tight if you want them to stay up! (They'd be a little easier to take on/off if the elastic was a little more stretchy. But overall they are good, and I have a couple pairs now. I am 5'2", 105 lbs and got the size small. They are a bit roomy - but I think in the way they're meant to look, and they are comfy and not too short for my liking. (If you are similar size you probably could get a size XS and they'd fit ok but I'd imagine maybe extra short).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I own about 7 pairs of these. I live in them. I normally wear a 12/14 and I order a XL. The fit is loose. Very comfortable. Linen fabric—they wash up well. I absolutely love these shorts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Im 5'2" 110lbs, xs fits well, has roxy tag on the shorts. Comfy, i like wearing them. I hand wash my clothes so i dont know how they would hold up in a washing machine and dryer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sent Wrong Color
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the color Stone, which is a tan color, but I received the white one. It’s very bright white and see through which is why I ordered the tan. You can tell it’s the wrong color because the string should be the same color as the shorts, like in the product photo, but it’s tan and they’re stark white. I’m going on vacation in 2 days so I don’t really have time to order another one. The material is a nice linen though and it fit well. For size reference, I got an extra small and I’m 5’7” and between 120 and 125 pounds with a 25” waist and 35.5in hips, if that helps anyone. I was debating small and extra small but the extra small is better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, worth the money. Do not appear cheap.
reviews.reviewText: These are a great quality and fit as expected. They are short but not too short in my opinion, they are shorter than mid-thigh though. Loose in the waist, draw string is great, fit perfect in the mid-section which is flattering to the figure. 5ft, 130lbs and I ordered a medium.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buy your normal size - they will stretch with wear
reviews.reviewText: With all the high-waisted shorts these days, these almost felt a bit too low (they sit right around the hip bone) but the draw string waist helps you get a good fit. The fabric felt a bit tight when I first tried them on but they definitely stretched out with wear. I would recommend buying your normal size. I have a 27 inch waist (at the narrowest part) and 36 inch hips (at the widest part) and the xs fit best (I tried the small first and it was a bit too baggy). Glad I switched to the extra-small considering how much they bagged out.

Great casual short. Give a bit of a linen look. They are short, but not too short. I’m 55, and have several pairs. If your worried about camouflaging the dredged cellulite, go one size up. I highly recommend.
Compre dos uno de color blanco y otro beige, se ven súper bien, los compre de mi talla (CH) y me quedan perfectos (no son pegados) me gustaron mucho.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These shorts seemed fine to start with, even though they were a quite loose and baggy. But a few minutes after wearing them (in 40C+/104F+ degree weather) they just got looser and looser. When I tied the rope waist tie it ended up folding the shorts so much at the front that it just looked ridiculous. I'm a size UK6 (24in waist) I think the XS would be more suited to a size UK 8 or bigger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These shorts have a linen-like appearance and feel. Lightweight and comfy. They're a bit longer than they appear on the model in the pictures so they're ideal for me (5ft4). I ordered XS and they fit great - loose fitting, which is what I wanted. I usually wear size 24 or 25 jeans (4-6 UK size or 00-0 US size).
